blogPost.excerpt: Are you a start up or a solo founder? don't have much funds to hire an animator/video editor to show case your product? worry not! videofork.co is here for you!! A free web based animation tool to create explainer videos for your startup/side project.
blogPost.body: Are you a start up or a solo founder? don't have much funds to hire an animator/video editor to show case your product? worry not! videofork.co is here for you!! A free web based animation tool to create explainer videos for your startup/side project.
blogPost.title: Videofork.co - Create explainer videos & GIFs for your startup for free
blogPost.author: Jaga Deep

localize.description: 你是一个初创公司或一个单独的创始人吗？ 没有太多的资金来聘请一个动画师/视频编辑来展示你的产品？ 不用担心！Videofork.co在这里为你服务！。一个免费的基于网络的动画工具，为你的创业公司/副业项目创建解释视频。
localize.tagline: 免费为您的创业公司创建解释视频和GIFs

localize.description: 你是一個初創公司或一個單獨的創始人嗎？ 沒有太多的資金來聘請一個動畫師/視頻編輯來展示你的產品？ 不用擔心！Videofork.co在這裏爲你服務！。一個免費的基於網絡的動畫工具，爲你的創業公司/副業項目創建解釋視頻。
localize.tagline: 免費爲您的創業公司創建解釋視頻和GIFs

previous.excerpt: doodad.dev is a site for tools to make the internet faster, more accessible, and more expressive. The pattern generator helps you make seamless, unique, royalty-free patterns. You can export as SVG, JPEG, or PNG. It's free forever, no tracking, etc. Enjoy!
previous.title: Doodad Pattern Generator - Create unique, seamless, royalty-free patterns

localize.description: doodad.dev是一个让互联网更快、更方便、更有表现力的工具网站。图案生成器可以帮助你制作无缝、独特、免版税的图案。你可以导出为SVG、JPEG或PNG格式。它永远免费，没有跟踪等。享受吧!
localize.tagline: 创建独特、无缝、免版税的图案

localize.description: doodad.dev是一個讓互聯網更快、更方便、更有表現力的工具網站。圖案生成器可以幫助你製作無縫、獨特、免版稅的圖案。你可以導出爲SVG、JPEG或PNG格式。它永遠免費，沒有跟蹤等。享受吧!
localize.tagline: 創建獨特、無縫、免版稅的圖案

next.excerpt: React Native ARIA provides a set of React hooks that handles behaviour, accessibility and interactions so you can implement custom components and design systems for Android, iOS and Web.
next.title: React Native ARIA - React Hooks to make accessible React Native design systems

localize.description: React Native ARIA提供了一套处理行为、可访问性和交互的React钩子，因此你可以为Android、iOS和Web实现自定义组件和设计系统。
localize.tagline: React Hooks让React Native设计系统无障碍化

localize.description: React Native ARIA提供了一套處理行爲、可訪問性和交互的React鉤子，因此你可以爲Android、iOS和Web實現自定義組件和設計系統。
localize.tagline: React Hooks讓React Native設計系統無障礙化
